title: SET_INPUT_EXCLUSIVE

0xEDE476E5EE29EDB10x4E8E29E6// SetInputExclusive
void SET_INPUT_EXCLUSIVE(int padIndex, int control);Parameters:padIndex: The control system instance to use. See ENABLE_ALL_CONTROL_ACTIONS.control: The control ID to check.
